H0.text: In 1818, British obstetrician James Blundell performed the first successful human what. Operation

H1.text: In 1818, British obstetrician James Blundell performed the first successful human what. Resuscitation

H2.text: In 1818, British obstetrician James Blundell performed the first successful human what. Amputation

H3.text: In 1818, British obstetrician James Blundell performed the first successful human what. Transfuse

A4.text: In 1818, after experiments with animals, he performed the first successful transfusion of human blood to treat postpartum hemorrhage at Guy's Hospital in London.
